sentence.Network_en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

sentence.Network_en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentence.Network_cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentence.Network_en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentence.Network_cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

means.word_mean: 1. the property of being no longer fashionable

auth_sentence.content: Even in old age, Walter was pretty scary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even in old age, Walter was pretty scary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even in old age, Walter was pretty scary.

auth_sentence.content: It's like old-school soul only with up-to-date instruments.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's like old-school soul only with up-to-date instruments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's like old-school soul only with up-to-date instruments.

auth_sentence.content: It has little to do with boring old-fashioned rock.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has little to do with boring old-fashioned rock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has little to do with boring old-fashioned rock.
